meanings.definition: (Malay/Indonesian) while, at the same time, meanwhile
meanings.english_definition: (Malay/Indonesian) while, at the same time, meanwhile

etymology.value: From Malay/Indonesian 'sambil', meaning 'while, at the same time'.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Sambil' is a conjunction used in Malay and Indonesian to indicate that two actions are happening simultaneously. It is similar to the English word 'while' or 'as'.
